name: nbp-bkb-env-tracker
description: This repository is for controlling deployment of the [Enmeshed](https://enmeshed.eu/explore) [Backbone](https://enmeshed.eu/explore/backbone) microservices and for keeping track of which version of which service is currently deployed to which environment.
author: js-soft GmbH <info@js-soft.com> (https://www.js-soft.com/)
